TypeSignature.Value: public interface IEnumerator<out T> : IDisposable, System.Collections.IEnumerator
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerator`1<+ T> implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.IDisposable
Public Interface IEnumerator(Of Out T) Implements IDisposable, IEnumerator
generic <typename T> public interface class IEnumerator : IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerator
type IEnumerator<'T> = interface interface IDisposable interface IEnumerator

span.span: The type of objects to enumerate.

summary.span: 支持在泛型集合上进行简单迭代。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是所有泛型枚举器的基接口。 is the base interface for all generic enumerators. C#`for each`语句( C++在VisualBasic中)隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。`For Each` `foreach`The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合的末尾, 则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后, 并返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时, 对的后续调用也将返回。 `false`When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用返回`false`, 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 提供此方法是为了实现 COM 互操作性。The method is provided for COM interoperability. 它不一定需要实现;相反, 实施者可以直接引发。It does not necessarily need to be implemented; instead, the implementer can simply throw a . 但是, 如果你选择执行此操作, 则应确保没有调用方依赖于该功能。However, if you choose to do this, you should make sure no callers are relying on the functionality. 如果对集合所做的更改 (如添加、修改或删除元素), 则枚举器的行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了自定义对象的集合类的接口的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the interface for a collection class of custom objects. 自定义对象是类型`Box`的实例, 而集合类为。 `BoxCollection`The custom object is an instance of the type `Box`, and the collection class is `BoxCollection`. 此代码示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxexamples/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxexamples/vb/program.vb#3)]

para.span: 实现此接口需要实现非泛型接口。

span.span: Implementing this interface requires implementing the nongeneric interface.

para.span: 和方法不依赖,并且仅出现在非泛型接口上。

span.span: The and methods do not depend on , and appear only on the nongeneric interface.

para.span: 此属性显示在两个接口上, 并且具有不同的返回类型。

span.span: The property appears on both interfaces, and has different return types.

para.span: 实现非泛型属性作为显式接口实现。

span.span: Implement the nongeneric property as an explicit interface implementation.

para.span: 这允许非泛型接口的任何使用者使用泛型接口。

span.span: This allows any consumer of the nongeneric interface to consume the generic interface.

para.span: 此外, 实现, 这将要求您实现方法。

span.span: In addition, implements , which requires you to implement the method.

para.span: 这使您可以在使用其他资源时关闭数据库连接或释放文件句柄或类似的操作。

span.span: This enables you to close database connections or release file handles or similar operations when using other resources.

para.span: 如果没有要释放的其他资源, 请提供空实现。

span.span: If there are no additional resources to dispose of, provide an empty implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As T
public: property T Current { T get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: Gets the element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: The element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以下任何条件下均未定义: is undefined under any of the following conditions: - 枚举器位于集合中第一个元素之前, 紧跟在创建枚举器之后。The enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection, immediately after the enumerator is created. 在读取的值之前, 必须调用以将枚举数前移到集合的第一个元素。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . - 对 返回`false`的最后一个调用, 指示集合的末尾。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection. - 由于对集合所做的更改 (如添加、修改或删除元素), 枚举器无效。The enumerator is invalidated due to changes made in the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements. 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element.

para.span: 实现此接口需要实现非泛型接口。

span.span: Implementing this interface requires implementing the nongeneric interface.

para.span: 此属性显示在两个接口上, 并且具有不同的返回类型。

span.span: The property appears on both interfaces, and has different return types.

para.span: 实现非泛型属性作为显式接口实现。

span.span: Implement the nongeneric property as an explicit interface implementation.

para.span: 这允许非泛型接口的任何使用者使用泛型接口。

span.span: This allows any consumer of the nongeneric interface to consume the generic interface.
